DOC.brief_title: Comparison Oral Iron With IV Iron Patients With Anemia Chronic Renal Failure Not Dialysis
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized open-label multicenter active-controlled study anemic patient Chronic Renal Failure yet receive dialysis . The duration study five month . After screen procedure include multiple hemoglobin value , patient randomly assign either IV Iron Sucrose ( 200mg X 5 ) oral iron sulfate ( 325mg TID ) 29 day . Safety assessment include record adverse event , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiograms clinical laboratory test . Efficacy parameter include hematologic parameter .
DOC.criteria: Creatine Clearance < 40 mL/min Average Baseline Hemoglobin < 10.5g/dL TSAT < 25 % Ferritin < 300ng/mL Blood Transfusion within 30days Uncontrolled Hypertension Suffering form concommitant disease liver Serious bacterial infection Pregnancy / lactation Symptomatic HIV Expected dialysis renal transplant study
